title: Mimiyori
notes:
超高級 - Super High End
最高級 - top-of-the-line
振動板 - Diaphragm
振動膜 - Oscillator membrane/driver/ not! Diaphragm
Maybe swap Condenser with Eletrostat (got complaints for not doing it lol)
専用アンプ - Specialized Amp (official material -> exclusive driver unit)
静電気 - Static Electricity
林尚武 - Naotake Hayashi (STAX founder)
どゆこと is どういうこと shortened
佐々木（ささき）取締役 -> Sasaki Director
０コンマ数ミリ -> sub-millimeter?
昂まる(たかぶる）is an old way of representing 高ぶる(たかぶる)
技術屋魂の結晶 - The embodiment of the spirit of engineering
